vehicleShowcase.title: Vehicle Showcase
vehicleShowcase.description: Native visionOS proof-of-concept app for immersive vehicle visualization. Users can explore detailed 3D car models in their physical space using RealityKit and Reality Composer Pro.
vehicleShowcase.detail1: Built entirely with SwiftUI and RealityKit, this app lets users place a life-size 3D vehicle in their physical environment using visionOS spatial anchoring.
vehicleShowcase.detail2: Users can walk around the vehicle, open doors, inspect the interior, and switch between color configurations — all rendered in real time with PBR materials via Reality Composer Pro.
vehicleShowcase.detail3: The project served as a proof-of-concept for a luxury automotive client, demonstrating how spatial computing can replace traditional showroom visits.

turbineViewer.title: Turbine Viewer
turbineViewer.description: visionOS proof-of-concept for inspecting industrial turbine models in spatial context with interactive 3D elements.
turbineViewer.detail1: A spatial app designed for industrial maintenance training. Engineers can inspect a full-scale turbine model placed in their workspace using visionOS hand tracking and gaze interactions.
turbineViewer.detail2: Interactive hotspots on the turbine highlight individual components with technical specifications, maintenance schedules, and animated exploded views.
turbineViewer.detail3: Built with RealityKit and SwiftUI, the app demonstrates how spatial computing can enhance technical training and remote equipment inspection.

ceramicsViewer.title: Ceramics Viewer
ceramicsViewer.description: Spatial ceramics visualization app allowing users to examine detailed ceramic products in augmented reality.
ceramicsViewer.detail1: This visionOS app allows users to browse a catalog of ceramic products and place them in their real-world environment at true scale for a realistic preview.
ceramicsViewer.detail2: Each ceramic piece features high-fidelity 3D scans with accurate material properties — glaze reflections, texture details, and color variations — powered by Reality Composer Pro shaders.
ceramicsViewer.detail3: Designed for a ceramics manufacturer, the app showcases how spatial computing can transform product visualization and e-commerce experiences.
